scripts.watch: watchify src/solaris.js --verbose -t [ babelify --presets [ env react ] ] --debug -o build/js/solaris-bundle.js
scripts.prebuild: shx rm -Rf build/ && shx mkdir -p build/js
scripts.build: cp -R static/* build && browserify src/solaris.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env react ] ] -o build/js/solaris-bundle.js
